entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'System.PlatformNotSupportedException: The system's ping utility could not be found.' thrown unless running as root on EndeavourOS. #103736
  • TarReader unable to parse header attribute number of archive generated in iOS #103734
  • [API Proposal]: Extend HostApplicationBuilderSettings with ServiceProviderOptions #103730
  • GetCustomAttribute cannot find attribute constructor #103722
  • Error: Garbage collector could not allocate #103719
    9.0.0
  • Buffer overrun on unhandled exception in nativeaot #103718
  • Add Aot annotations/reflection to AOT profile and enable dataannotation Attributes validation and Asp.Net Controlers in AOT scenarioslers in AOT scenarios #103716
  • STJ NullPropertyNameFail test failing in CI #103715
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires5.TestCacheExpiryOrdering() #103711
  • [Linux] Segmentation fault in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103703
  • ImageConverter not found in .Net Standard lib referenced by .Net Framework 4.7.2 app #103702
    9.0.0
  • [MONO] * Assertion: should not be reached at `/__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3850` #103698
  • [Apple][TvOS] Genereted schema in JsonSchemaExporter doesn not match the expected specification #103694
  • DispatchProxy not working in dotnet 9 #103693
  • [apple][TvOS] Failed to sign System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.app #103692
  • Ask for the "PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy" required by Apple #103691
  • [mono] Interpreter and MiniJIT Libraries Test CI is timing-out #103688
  • MetaDataGetDispenser export missing for PublishSingleFile=true, and --self-contained #103687
  • [API Proposal]: ThreadLocal<T>.GetEnumerator() #103684
  • DisableBitTests.EnabledThroughFeatureSwitch/DisabledAlwaysInBrowser failures #103683
  • [API Proposal]: trim-safe RuntimeHelpers.RunClassConstructor(Type) overload #103679

Closed

  • Why the D value of RSA is different #102418
  • LibraryTests (mostly) timing out #103674
  • Regex parser regression #102643
    9.0.0
  • Android: Installed X509 certificates can't be used with SSL authentication #99874
  • Missing centos-stream9 runtime assets #102344
  • [browser][MT] Tests timed out #102559
    9.0.0
  • MT-System.Threading.Tests timeout #102664
    9.0.0
  • `InlineArrayAttribute` should allow for vectorization #103712
    Future
  • Problem with Program build in Visual Studio for ARM #103685
  • Wasm test failure: System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open #102955
  • NuGet FatalProtocolException in LibraryImportGenerator tests #103541
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.TryGetValueFalse<String, String> #51258
    Future
  • PGO: test failure in VolatileTest_op_mul on linux arm32 #57219
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67176
    Future
  • Test failure: System.IO.FileSystem.Tests #88276
    Future
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.TransactionManagerTest.DefaultTimeout_MaxTimeout_Set_Get #90085
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails under jitstress on win-x86 #102335
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test->AsOp()->gtOp1' during 'Update flow graph early pass' #103600
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_90423 fails with "Assertion failed '(op2 == idx) || (op2->gtEffectiveVal() == idx)' during 'Find oper order'" #103577
    9.0.0
  • Support exporting STJ serialization contracts to JSON schema #100159
    9.0.0
  • `JsonObject` should support property order manipulation #102932
    9.0.0
  • Job "SuperPMI tpdiff windows x86" timeouts #103505
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Rename AdvSimd/Sve Load/Store vector API names #102340
    9.0.0
  • Is the locking in ReflectionComposablePart correct? #103650
  • [Feature Request]: Add synchronous gauge instrument #92625
    9.0.0
  • LdapConnection.SessionOptions.AutoReconnect throws LdapException on Linux #103431
    Future
  • Mono builds failing with file not found error #103677
  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in comparer interfaces #103323
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `allows ref struct` to `TComparer` in BinarySearch #103270
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve WebUtility.HtmlEncode / UrlEncode performance #103737
    area-System.Net
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Performance improvements in `JsonValue`. #103733
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Change fgMorphMultiOp to fgMorphHWIntrinsic #103732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix wrong CONTEXT_UNWOUND_TO_CALL from special APC on ARM64 #103731
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Improve Span.Count #103728
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add non-public SetEntryAssembly() API to System.Reflection #103726
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Add Not, InsertIntoShiftedVector #103725
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add an IsKnownConstant path to SinCos #103724
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Fix downwards loop transformation with multiply executed exiting blocks #103723
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't allocate unnecessary SslCtx #103720
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve perf of CredentialCache.GetCredential #103714
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [DRAFT] More TypName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Prezero memory for RefPosition and Interval (version 2) #103709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prezero memory for RefPosition and Interval #103707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][firefox] Test crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #103706
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid invalidating DFS tree unconditionally after RBO #103699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm AdvSimd: Rename StoreVectorMxN to Store #103689
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bump ws from 8.4.0 to 8.17.1 in /src/libraries/System.Net.WebSockets.Client/tests #103686
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, javascript
  • Fix the ICU time format conversion logic #103681
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert "Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan" #103704
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime
  • Use Stream.CopyTo{Async} in NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Append{Async} #103669
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid concatenating adjacent regex loops+strings under right-to-left #103591
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Move runtime-deps CentOS Stream 8 package to CentOS Stream 9. #103708
    breaking-change, area-Setup
  • [wasm] Remove all XunitShowProgress=true #103621
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing 'RelativePath' metadata in items produced by AOT compiler #103633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up `RefPosition` "killed registers" storage #103560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always create constructed MethodTable for MdArray & co. #103696
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consistently report unresolved members in illink #103667
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use the right link in the argument exception docs #103682
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove System.IO.Hashing dependency from Nrbf #103700
    needs-area-label
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move downlevel tests to outerloop #103595
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103603
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103446
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Store one segment inline in ABIPassingInformation #103690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix permute node type in AVX simd sum #103680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Have COND_JUMP handling check for gtEffectiveVal #103649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid check for returns in methods with pinvokes in LSRA #103559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add System.IO.Hashing dependency to windowsdesktop transport pack #103695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • call gtFoldExpr after fgMorphExpandInstanceField #103648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add IList<T> and related APIs to JsonObject. #103645
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-diffs job #103631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename StoreVectorMxNAndZip to StoreVectorAndZip #103638
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Shuffle(v, [2, 3, 0, 1]) -> ext_64 v,v,1 #103598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix locking in ReflectionComposablePart.ImportsCache #103660
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix print when outputting disasm #103618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • event changes for DATAS #103405
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Gauge Metrics Instrument #103543
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Use `allows ref struct` in comparer interfaces #103604
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2477796 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on arm64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][Apple-Mobile][HybridGlobalization] Fix DatePattern formats + add new tests #102464
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • `InlineArray`'s `Equals` and `GetHashCode` throw #103612
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Dispose DbCommand in DbMetaDataFactory.ExecuteCommand #103593
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Handle possible null in SerialStream.Dispose() on Windows #103671
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
